Package com.mopub.nativeads

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CustomEventNative.CustomEventNativeListener  
    CustomEventNative.ImageListener  
    MoPubAdRenderer<T>
    An interface for creating ad views and rendering them using ad data.
    MoPubNative.MoPubNativeEventListener  
    MoPubNative.MoPubNativeListener Deprecated
    As of release 2.4, use MoPubNative.MoPubNativeEventListener and MoPubNative.MoPubNativeNetworkListener instead.
    MoPubNative.MoPubNativeNetworkListener  
    MoPubNativeAdLoadedListener
    A listener for determining when ads are loaded into an ad Placer
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdapterHelper Deprecated
    As of release 2.4, use MoPubAdAdapter or MoPubStreamAdPlacer instead
    CustomEventNative
    CustomEventNative is a base class for custom events that support native ads.
    MoPubAdAdapter
    MoPubAdAdapter facilitates placing ads into an Android ListView or other widgets that use a ListAdapter.
    MoPubCustomEventNative  
    MoPubNative  
    MoPubNativeAdPositioning
    Provides factory methods for setting up native ad positions.
    MoPubNativeAdPositioning.Builder Deprecated
    MoPubNativeAdPositioning.MoPubClientPositioning
    Allows hard-coding ad positions into your app.
    MoPubNativeAdPositioning.MoPubServerPositioning
    Allows the SDK to connect to the MoPub server in order to determine ad positions.
    MoPubNativeAdRenderer
    An implementation of MoPubAdRenderer for rendering native ads.
    MoPubStreamAdPlacer
    MoPubStreamAdPlacer facilitates loading ads and placing them into a content stream.
    NativeResponse  
    PositioningRequest  
    RequestParameters  
    RequestParameters.Builder  
    ViewBinder  
    ViewBinder.Builder

    Enum Description
    NativeErrorCode  
    RequestParameters.NativeAdAsset
